title: How to Jailbreak the Apple TV 3

steps.title: Verify that your Apple TV 3 is running iOS 5.0.2 or earlier.
steps.content: Verify that your Apple TV 3 is running iOS 5.0.2 or earlier. Snow3rd is unable to jailbreak Apple TVs running iOS versions later than 5.0.2. Navigate to Settings > General > About to determine the version of iOS installed on your Apple TV 3. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Verify that you have access to a computer running Windows 7, Windows Vista, or Windows XP.
steps.content: Verify that you have access to a computer running Windows 7, Windows Vista, or Windows XP. Snow3rd is only compatible with these earlier versions of Windows, and is not compatible with Windows 8 or Mac OS X.

steps.title: Navigate to the Snow3rd website at https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Jailbreak-the-Apple-TV-3&action=edit&tech_widget=1 and click on “Snow3rd Download.
steps.content: Navigate to the Snow3rd website at https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Jailbreak-the-Apple-TV-3&action=edit&tech_widget=1 and click on “Snow3rd Download. ”

steps.title: Select the option to save the .zip file to your desktop.
steps.content: Select the option to save the .zip file to your desktop.

steps.title: Close and end all open applications and processes running on your Windows computer.
steps.content: Close and end all open applications and processes running on your Windows computer.

steps.title: Connect the Apple TV 3 to your computer using a micro USB cable.
steps.content: Connect the Apple TV 3 to your computer using a micro USB cable. The Apple TV’s USB port is located on the back of the device.

steps.title: Disconnect the Apple TV from its power source.
steps.content: Disconnect the Apple TV from its power source. The only wire connected to the Apple TV 3 should be the mini USB cable.

steps.title: Navigate to your Windows desktop and double-click on the Snow3rd .zip file.
steps.content: Navigate to your Windows desktop and double-click on the Snow3rd .zip file. This will extract its contents, and the Snow3rd dialog will display on-screen.

steps.title: Click on the “Jailbreak” button.
steps.content: Click on the “Jailbreak” button. The jailbreaking process will begin, and its progress will display in the status bar. The procedure may take up to several minutes to complete.

steps.title: Close the Snow3rd dialog box when the “Jailbreak Successful” message displays on-screen.
steps.content: Close the Snow3rd dialog box when the “Jailbreak Successful” message displays on-screen.

steps.title: Disconnect the Apple TV 3 from the mini USB cable, then restart the device.
steps.content: Disconnect the Apple TV 3 from the mini USB cable, then restart the device.

steps.title: Reconnect the Apple TV 3 to your computer after the restart, then launch iTunes on your computer.
steps.content: Reconnect the Apple TV 3 to your computer after the restart, then launch iTunes on your computer.

steps.title: Verify that iTunes recognizes the Apple TV 3.
steps.content: Verify that iTunes recognizes the Apple TV 3. If iTunes recognizes your device and displays the Apple TV icon at the top left corner, it means the jailbreak was successful.

steps.title: Connect the Apple TV 3 to its power source and HDMI cable.
steps.content: Connect the Apple TV 3 to its power source and HDMI cable. Your Apple TV 3 is now jailbroken and has the ability to install and run jailbroken apps you download from the Web outside of App Store.
